title: Fix all remaining output bugs.

comments.body:
## [Current coverage][1] is `95.53%`
> Merging **#78** into **master** will decrease coverage by **-0.14%** as of [`458b7ae`][3]


```diff
@@            master     #78   diff @@
======================================
  Files           14      14       
  Stmts          694     717    +23
  Branches        89      92     +3
  Methods                          
======================================
+ Hit            664     685    +21
  Partial          0       0       
- Missed          30      32     +2
```

> Review entire [Coverage Diff][4] as of [`458b7ae`][3]


-----
### [Uncovered Suggestions][2]

1. `+0.98%` via [...estFirstSearch.scala#175...181](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/BestFirstSearch.scala?ref=458b7ae40ab23fd1c647924225bb53b6398dc276#175) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...lafmt/ScalaFmt.scala#53...54](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/ScalaFmt.scala?ref=458b7ae40ab23fd1c647924225bb53b6398dc276#53) 
1. `+0.28%` via [...internal/Split.scala#74...75](https://codecov.io/github/olafurpg/scalafmt/core/src/main/scala/org/scalafmt/internal/Split.scala?ref=458b7ae40ab23fd1c647924225bb53b6398dc276#74) 
1. *[See 7 more...][2]*

body:
* There are only timeout exceptions now.
* make easier to debug optimizations
* Add support for try/catch
* no dequeueAll when inside single line block
* fix off by one error in policy summary
* Handle newlines in case body.
* Fix cast exception on templates.
